quitPlan.title: Quit Plan

intro.personalizedPlan: A personalized plan that adapts to your habits and helps you quit smoking faster.
intro.stepByStep: Your step-by-step plan will finally help you quit nicotine, overcome cravings and lead a healthier lifestyle.
intro.scientificMethod: Our science-based method will truly free you from addiction.

quitPlan.dateIncreases: Choosing a specific date increases the likelihood of achieving your goal.
quitPlan.chooseRealistic: Choose a realistic and achievable date based on your current consumption level.
quitPlan.baselineIs: Your baseline is the reference point that will be used in the Quit Plan to help you stop smoking.
quitPlan.howManyPuffs: How many puffs do you currently take per day?
quitPlan.recommendRegister: We recommend logging at least one day to calculate an accurate starting point.

limitTracker.title: Limit Tracker
limitTracker.description: The Limit Tracker feature helps you quit smoking by showing the maximum number of puffs per day.

countdown.title: Countdown Timer
countdown.description: Counts down to the complete quit date.

chart.title: Progress Chart
chart.description: Shows daily progress. Red line ‚Äî set limit (decreases daily: 20 ‚Üí 19 ‚Üí 18 ‚Üí ... ‚Üí 0), blue line ‚Äî actual number of cigarettes per day.

banner.quote1: Every day without smoking is a victory
banner.quote2: Your health is recovering right now
banner.quote4: You are stronger than you think
